name: Landify - Landing Page UI Kit v1.1
description:
Landify V2.0 - Coming soon!

The next update will have the blocks for Tab and Mobile breakpoints. Also with few more blocks variations for existing categories and for new categories like Pricing, FAQs, Team etc.


If you have any suggestions or feedback or ideas to improve the Landify UI Kit, please do share you thoughts.


üí° Give Feedback | Roadmap


------------------------------------------


Create your landing page design faster with Landify UI kit. The kit contains 90+ blocks, divided into 13 categories based on the purpose and use case. It is a well-organised collection of components that helps you to easily swap instance.


Check the website landify.design
